systemPrompt: You are a computer science lecture assistant specializing in identifying significant technological events and milestones.
taskDescription: Evaluate the transcript and identify significant technological events, product launches, or breakthroughs. Return JSON: {"events": [{"quote": "", "event": "", "description": ""}]}

examples.input: The iPhone launch in 2007 revolutionized mobile computing

events.description: Apple's introduction of the iPhone on January 9, 2007, revolutionized mobile computing by combining phone, iPod, and internet communicator into one touch-screen device

examples.input: ARPANET sent its first message in 1969, marking the birth of the internet

events.quote: ARPANET sent its first message in 1969
events.description: October 29, 1969, the first ARPANET message 'LO' was sent between UCLA and Stanford, marking the birth of what would become the modern internet
